title: Matteo Altamore
subtitle: Software Engineer
body: Hi, glad to see you here! I am Matteo, an enthusiastic React engineer from Italy. Currently, I'm working at Deloitte Digital, a consultancy company where I've developed with React.js, Next.js and SASS. During my free time I really like to study new open source stuff like frameworks, libraries and languages, and maybe I'd put these into new projects in my work or in my github. Also I love manga and play videogames with my friends!
